message: This answer is spot on however I would like your thoughts on a more hands-on advise.
story: Adel K. Khalil shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: How can I become an outstanding software architect and consulting expert?
caption: www.quora.com
description: Geo Sebastian's answer: It's fairly simple actually, once you have amazing proficiency in software engineering, having made thousands of mistakes to tell you what works and what doesn't and of course the diversity of the projects that you've done. And let's not forget the last part, strong knowle...

data.message: Sounds like one of those Noob questions, like, how do I become Mozart? when you are learning to play the piano. Obviously, to be come a consultant, people have to trust your experience. It means you have had lots of practical experience, failed enough times and also had enough successes. I would study software engineering, as I am developing software. Get to knopw more about middleware, integration projects, Read some Martin Fowler classics. And just do it.
